sentences.en: A metric unit of mass equal to one hundredth ( 10 - 2 ) of a gram.
sentences.cn: 厘克质量的公制单位,等于百分之一克 ( 10 - 2 )

sentences.en: A metric unit of volume equal to one hundredth ( 10 - 2 ) of a liter.
sentences.cn: 厘升容积的公制单位,等于百分之一升 ( 10 - 2 )

sentences.en: A unit of length equal to one hundredth ( 10 - 2 ) of a meter.
sentences.cn: 厘米长度单位,等于百分之一米 ( 10 - 2 )

sentences.en: An exposure of one - hundredth of a second will be enough.
sentences.cn: 曝光百分之一秒就够了.

sentences.en: Before long, the one - hundredth prince gained the respect and affection of all.
sentences.cn: 没过多久, 这位王子就得到所有人的尊敬和爱戴.

sentences.en: For example, if you say that something is "a few microns across", explain that a micron is one-millionth of a metre, and "about one hundredth the width of a human hair".
sentences.cn: 例如，如果您说某事物只有几微米，那么就要解释一微米是百万分之一米，大约是人头发宽度的百分之一。

sentences.en: He asked himself for the hundredth time who the club members were.
sentences.cn: 他一直在想这个俱乐部的成员都有谁.

sentences.en: He has knocked a hundredth of a second from the world record.
sentences.cn: 他以0.01秒的优势打破了世界纪录.

sentences.en: He is a hundredth of the association.
sentences.cn: 他是该协会的百名会员之一.

sentences.en: He was the hundredth applicant for the job.
sentences.cn: 他是第100个申请这项工作的人.

sentences.en: He went on to celebrate his hundredth birthday.
sentences.cn: 继而,他还要庆祝自己的百岁生日.

sentences.en: In order to celebrate the one hundredth birthday of our school, every class will hold a party.
sentences.cn: 为了庆祝我校第一百周岁生日，各班都将举行一个庆祝会。

sentences.en: One one - hundredth a percent, used in measuring yield differences among bonds.
sentences.cn: 万分之一点, 用来测量票据间收益差值.

sentences.en: Race results can be automatically timed to hundredth of a second.
sentences.cn: 可以自动计时,精确到百分之一秒.

sentences.en: The bank celebrates its hundredth anniversary in December.
sentences.cn: 这家银行将于12月庆祝其成立100周年。

sentences.en: The centimeter is one - tenth of the decimeter or one - hundredth of the meter.
sentences.cn: 厘米是分米的 十分之一.或者说是米的百分之一.

sentences.en: The system can print electronic features smaller than a hundredth of a millimetre wide from a variety of materials.
sentences.cn: 这个系统能在许多种类的材料上印刷比一毫米的一百分之一还要小的东西。

sentences.en: When is the two hundredth anniversary of Mozart's death?
sentences.cn: 莫扎特逝世两百周年纪念是什么时候?

words.tran_cn: 第一百，第一百个；百分之一

trans.tran_cn: 第一百的；一百分之一的
第100个，百分之一，第一百号，第一百个
